products.name: Bottochino Classico
products.description: Botticino Classico marble flooring was first quarried & worked in the Italian region of Brescia. The overall look of Botticino Classico is a very classy beige with an undertone of light brown, green, or gold throughout. Botticino Classico has a very elegant look and timeless styling, perfect for any setting. Because of its delicate features, it can be used for both residential and commercial projects that require very high-end materials. The beautiful coloration, light texture, and durability of Botticino Classico make it a great choice for all types of flooring, walls, kitchen counters, and other architectural decorative pieces. The finishes available for Botticino Classico are polished, honed, and satin.

Breccia Aurora is available in a high-sheen polished finish or in a natural honed stone finish, which provides excellent light reflection and enhances space with its timeless Mediterranean appearance. Breccia Aurora is perfect for all types of refined interior space design requiring both the beauty and strength of the stone.
